name: The Alchemyst
description:
You are an old Alchemist, forgotten by society.  
In your little hut, you spend your last days brewing some very experimental potions. 

Try to keep the heat under control by stirring the pot at the correct intervals or else something might go terribly wrong. Then again, who’s to say your experiments won’t go wrong anyway?   

Click the pot to stir the concoction and try to keep the heat at the correct levels. Let it fall too much and everything explodes. Unlock new upgrades to improve your potion making process and who knows? Maybe you’ll discover something that can actually help humanity forward!
